geninfo.para: Shell® Aeroshell 33 or Mobil SHC 100 Synthetic Grease is required for periodic lubrication of the intermediate steering shaft. Lubricating the intermediate steering shaft with any other grease will result in inadequate lubrication, especially during cold operating conditions.

svcproc.title: Procedure
svcproc.para: The intermediate steering shaft is pre-lubricated for assembly at the supplier prior to it being installed into the ProStar chassis. Since the new synthetic grease is now available, the intermediate shaft lubrication should be completed at PDI. Use of 2595564C1 synthetic grease will require the use of a hand grease gun that will accept a 13.7 oz. tube of grease. Mark the grease gun, paint or other means, that identify this as a special grease for the ProStar steering shaft.
